title: The Favorites - NFL Week 4 Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - NFL Week 4 Gambling Preview
description:
After a wild NFL ride last week, Chad Simon and professional gambler Simon Hunter of the Action Network return to preview every NFL game from top-to-bottom. First they feast on a disgusting Thursday Night Football matchup involving the Bengals and a team who may already be quitting on first-year coach Urban Meyer. They are effusive in their praise for the Panthers at +5 this week vs Dallas, and even demand action on the lowly New York Jets as sizable underdogs. Plus listeners get a Foxhole Pick Of The Week, the identification of a Rah Rah Mike Tomlin Spot, and so much more.

TNF (9 MIN)

NYG NO (15 MIN)

KC PHL (19 MIN)

BUF HOU (23 MIN)

CAR DAL (24 MIN)

CLE MIN (31 MIN)

DET CHI (34 MIN)

TEN NYJ (37 MIN)

IND MIA (39 MIN)

WFT AZ (40 MIN)

SEA SF (43 MIN)

AZ LAR (46 MIN)

PIT GB (48 MIN)

BALT DEN (50 MIN)

TB NE (52 MIN)

MNF (55 MIN)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
